description.key: `~~~py  #Translate the following function from Python to R:  def get_stats(event_name): df_stats = df[df['event_name']==event_name]  stats = df_stats['player_id']  stats = stats.value_counts()  return statsdf_stats = df[df[‘event_name’]==event_name],}, `
